title: @Riot regarding mid year assassin update
body:
What Assassins can we expect to see in the late year Assassin update? People like Akali, Kassadin, Talon etc. Or just all Assassins in general, and what will be the typical changes for each champion?

Thanks!!

replies.body: We're doing a mage update mid year. Assassins are a group we'd like to get to at a later point, there are a few other good options for the class after mages too though. Given how far away that is, we won't be committing to a class, let alone identifying individual champions and their possible changes, for quite a while.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2W2ghbW0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-28T23:20:30.313+0000)
>
> We're doing a mage update mid year. Assassins are a group we'd like to get to at a later point, there are a few other good options for the class after mages too though. Given how far away that is, we won't be committing to a class, let alone identifying individual champions and their possible changes, for quite a while.

Are jungle assassins like Lee, Eve and Rengar candidates to be in the update, or is it going to be for lane assassins only ?

> [{quoted}](name=Angelofchaos16x,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2W2ghbW0,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-01-28T23:22:24.609+0000)
>
> Are jungle assassins like Lee, Eve and Rengar candidates to be in the update, or is it going to be for lane assassins only ?

He literally just said they have no idea.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2W2ghbW0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-28T23:20:30.313+0000)
>
> We're doing a mage update mid year. Assassins are a group we'd like to get to at a later point, there are a few other good options for the class after mages too though. Given how far away that is, we won't be committing to a class, let alone identifying individual champions and their possible changes, for quite a while.

Can I suggest some Akali tweaks in the meantime that are logical? I feel like shes strong atm but not reliable so maybe some changes i have to suggest might be useful?

Is your priority based on groups that interact with eachother more intimately? As far as - tanks are in the most reliable spot, and Marksman are most easily balanced around tanks - thus you balanced the marksman first. Then that would lead you to logically move to mages, who also are easily balanced around tanks after marksman are in a good spot. Assassins seem to be the ones who would logically be balanced last, as they have the most impact on the other "more easily" balanced roles.  Hope that makes sense.
It's a mage update not an Assassin one.  Assassins are coming much later
